channel.title: Less is better comments on When I was a boy I used a pencil and paper

item.title: "When I was a boy I used a pencil and paper" by jlam
item.description:
But nowadays kids use digital cameras to take snapshots of debugging traces.

This was some sharing of work in progress in getting Windows XP to boot on MacIntels which is now apparently a done deal.
item.guid: When I was a boy I used a pencil and paper
item.link: When I was a boy I used a pencil and paper
